column5: Just caught part of the news but not all of the storey, somewhere in the States a blimp became detached and could be on its way towards the east coast , sorry I don't have more info, just a not so normal news storey
And CNN says: Thank goodness we have something to cover.

Ya, but did you hear about the astroid that is heading our way? Not kidding either, should miss us by a couple of hundred thousand miles but they aren't sure at this point!  http://www.ibtimes.co.uk/now-thats-close-shave-secrets-halloween-asteroid-2015-tb145-headed-earth-1526093
sure takes ones mind off politics lol
sure takes ones mind off politics lol  I hear they're going to shoot it down using F-16's armed with failed presidential candidates!!!!
I hear they're going to shoot it down using F-16's armed with failed presidential candidates!!!! Funny indeed but not the best of ideas. Politicians almost always miss their mark.
